title: Work with translation files
contents:
mode_edit

使用翻译文件link

Work with translation fileslink

准备好要翻译的组件后，使用 Angular CLI 的 extract-i18n 命令将组件中的标记文本提取到源语言文件中。

After you prepare a component for translation, use the extract-i18n Angular CLI command to extract the marked text in the component into a source language file.

已标记的文本包括标记为 i18n 的文本、标记为 i18n-属性的属性和标记为 $localize 的文本，如准备翻译模板中所述。

The marked text includes text marked with i18n, attributes marked with i18n-attribute, and text tagged with $localize as described in Prepare templates for translations.

完成以下步骤为你的项目创建和更新翻译文件。

Complete the following steps to create and update translation files for your project.

  1. 提取源语言文件。

    Extract the source language file.

  2. （可选）更改位置、格式和名称。

    Optionally, change the location, format, and name.

  3. 复制源语言文件以便为每种语言创建一个翻译文件。

    Copy the source language file to create a translation file for each language.

  4. 翻译每个翻译文件

    Translate each translation file.

  5. 分别翻译复数和替代表达式。

    Translate plurals and alternate expressions separately.

    1. 翻译复数。

      Translate plurals.

    2. 翻译替代表达式。

      Translate alternate expressions.

    3. 翻译嵌套表达式。

      Translate nested expressions.

提取源语言文件link

Extract the source language filelink

要提取源语言文件，请完成以下操作。

To extract the source language file, complete the following actions.

  1. 打开终端窗口。

    Open a terminal window.

  2. 切换到你的项目根目录。

    Change to the root directory of your project.

  3. 运行以下 CLI 命令。

    Run the following CLI command.

    ng extract-i18n

extract-i18n 命令在项目的根目录中创建一个名为 messages.xlf 的源语言文件。有关 XML 本地化交换文件格式（XLIFF，版本 1.2）的更多信息，请参阅 XLIFF。

The extract-i18n command creates a source language file named messages.xlf in the root directory of your project. For more information about the XML Localization Interchange File Format (XLIFF, version 1.2), see XLIFF.

使用以下 extract-i18n 命令选项更改源语言文件位置、格式和文件名。

Use the following extract-i18n command options to change the source language file location, format, and file name.

命令选项

Command option

详情

Details
--format

设置输出文件的格式

Set the format of the output file
--outFile

设置输出文件的名称

Set the name of the output file
--output-path

设置输出目录的路径

Set the path of the output directory

更改源语言文件的位置link

Change the source language file locationlink

要在 src/locale 目录中创建文件，请将输出路径指定为选项。

To create a file in the src/locale directory, specify the output path as an option.

extract-18n --output-path 示例link

extract-18n --output-path examplelink

以下示例将输出路径指定给选项。

The following example specifies the output path as an option.

ng extract-i18n --output-path src/locale

更改源语言文件格式link

Change the source language file formatlink

extract-i18n 命令会创建如下翻译格式的文件。

The extract-i18n command creates files in the following translation formats.

翻译格式

Translation format

详情

Details

文件扩展名

File extension
ARB

应用资源包

Application Resource Bundle

 .arb
JSON

JavaScript 对象表示法

JavaScript Object Notation

 .json
XLIFF 1.2

XML 本地化交换文件格式，版本 1.2

XML Localization Interchange File Format, version 1.2

 .xlf
XLIFF 2

XML 本地化交换文件格式，版本 2

XML Localization Interchange File Format, version 2

 .xlf
XMB

XML 消息包

XML Message Bundle

 .xmb (.xtb)

使用 --format 命令选项明确指定转换格式。

Specify the translation format explicitly with the --format command option.

XMB 格式生成 .xmb 扩展名的源语言文件，但生成 .xtb 扩展名的翻译文件。

The XMB format generates .xmb source language files, but uses.xtb translation files.

extract-18n --format 示例link

extract-18n --format examplelink

以下示例演示了几种翻译格式。

The following example demonstrates several translation formats.

ng extract-i18n --format=xlf ng extract-i18n --format=xlf2 ng extract-i18n --format=xmb ng extract-i18n --format=json ng extract-i18n --format=arb

更改源语言文件名link

Change the source language file namelink

要更改提取工具生成的源语言文件的名称，请使用 --outFile 命令选项。

To change the name of the source language file generated by the extraction tool, use the --outFile command option.

extract-18n --out-file 示例link

extract-18n --out-file examplelink

以下示例演示命名输出文件。

The following example demonstrates naming the output file.

ng extract-i18n --out-file source.xlf

为每种语言创建一个翻译文件link

Create a translation file for each languagelink

要为语言环境或语言创建翻译文件，请完成以下操作。

To create a translation file for a locale or language, complete the following actions.

  1. 提取源语言文件。

    Extract the source language file.

  2. 复制源语言文件，为每种语言创建一个翻译文件。

    Make a copy of the source language file to create a translation file for each language.

  3. 重命名翻译文件以添加语言环境标识。

    Rename the translation file to add the locale.

    messages.xlf --> message.{locale}.xlf

  4. 在你的项目根目录创建一个名为 locale 的新目录。

    Create a new directory at your project root named locale.

    src/locale

  5. 将翻译文件移到新目录。

    Move the translation file to the new directory.

  6. 将翻译文件发送给你的翻译人员。

    Send the translation file to your translator.

  7. 对要添加到应用程序中的每种语言重复上述步骤。

    Repeat the above steps for each language you want to add to your application.

法语的 extract-i18n 示例link

extract-i18n example for Frenchlink

比如，要创建法语翻译文件，请完成以下操作。

For example, to create a French translation file, complete the following actions.

  1. 运行 extract-18n 命令。

    Run the extract-18n command.

  2. 复制 messages.xlf 源语言文件。

    Make a copy of the messages.xlf source language file.

  3. 将副本重命名为 messages.fr.xlf 以进行法语 ( fr ) 翻译。

    Rename the copy to messages.fr.xlf for the French language (fr) translation.

  4. 将 fr 翻译文件移动到 src/locale 目录。

    Move the fr translation file to the src/locale directory.

  5. 将 fr 翻译文件发送给翻译人员。

    Send the fr translation file to the translator.

翻译每个翻译文件link

Translate each translation filelink

除非你精通该语言并有时间编辑翻译，否则你可能会完成以下步骤。

Unless you are fluent in the language and have the time to edit translations, you will likely complete the following steps.

  1. 将每个翻译文件发送给翻译人员。

    Send each translation file to a translator.

  2. 翻译人员使用 XLIFF 文件编辑器完成以下操作。

    The translator uses an XLIFF file editor complete the following actions.

    1. 创建翻译。

      Create the translation.

    2. 编辑翻译。

      Edit the translation.

法语翻译流程示例link

Translation process example for Frenchlink

要演示该过程，请查看 Angular 国际化应用范例中的 messages.fr.xlf 文件。Angular 国际化应用范例中就包含法语翻译文件，你无需特殊的 XLIFF 编辑器或法语知识即可进行编辑。

To demonstrate the process, review the messages.fr.xlf file in the Example Angular Internationalization application. The Example Angular Internationalization application includes a French translation for you to edit without a special XLIFF editor or knowledge of French.

以下操作描述了法语的翻译过程。

The following actions describe the translation process for French.

  1. 打开 messages.fr.xlf 并找到第一个 <trans-unit> 元素。这是一个翻译单元，也称为文本节点，表示之前用 i18n 属性标记的 <h1> 问候标签的翻译。

    Open messages.fr.xlf and find the first <trans-unit> element. This is a translation unit, also known as a text node, that represents the translation of the <h1> greeting tag that was previously marked with the i18n attribute.

    <trans-unit id="introductionHeader" datatype="html"> <source>Hello i18n!</source> <note priority="1" from="description">An introduction header for this sample</note> <note priority="1" from="meaning">User welcome</note> </trans-unit>

    id="introductionHeader" 是自定义 ID，但没有源 HTML 中所需的 @@ 前缀。

    The id="introductionHeader" is a custom ID, but without the @@ prefix required in the source HTML.

  2. 复制文本节点中的 <source>...</source> 元素，将其重命名为 target，然后将内容替换为法语文本。

    Duplicate the <source>... </source> element in the text node, rename it to target, and then replace the content with the French text.

    <trans-unit id="introductionHeader" datatype="html"> <source>Hello i18n!</source> <target>Bonjour i18n !</target> <note priority="1" from="description">An introduction header for this sample</note> <note priority="1" from="meaning">User welcome</note> </trans-unit>

    在更复杂的翻译中，描述和含义元素中的信息和上下文可帮助你选择正确的词进行翻译。

    In a more complex translation, the information and context in the description and meaning elements help you choose the right words for translation.

  3. 翻译其他文本节点。以下示例显示了翻译方式。

    Translate the other text nodes. The following example displays the way to translate.

    <trans-unit id="ba0cc104d3d69bf669f97b8d96a4c5d8d9559aa3" datatype="html"> <source>I don't output any element</source> <target>Je n'affiche aucun élément</target> </trans-unit> <trans-unit id="701174153757adf13e7c24a248c8a873ac9f5193" datatype="html"> <source>Angular logo</source> <target>Logo d'Angular</target> </trans-unit>

    不要更改这些翻译单元的 ID。每个 id 属性由 Angular 生成，它取决于组件文本的内容和所指定的含义。如果你更改了文本或含义，则 id 属性就会更改。有关管理文本更新和 ID 的更多信息，请参阅 自定义 ID。

    Don't change the IDs for translation units. Each id attribute is generated by Angular and depends on the content of the component text and the assigned meaning. If you change either the text or the meaning, then the id attribute changes. For more about managing text updates and IDs, see custom IDs.

翻译复数link

Translate pluralslink

根据需要为每种语言添加或删除复数分支。

Add or remove plural cases as needed for each language.

语言复数规则，参见 CLDR 复数规则。

For language plural rules, see CLDR plural rules.

minute plural 例子link

minute plural examplelink

要翻译 plural，就要翻译 ICU 格式的匹配值。

To translate a plural, translate the ICU format match values.

  • just now

  • one minute ago

  • <x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{minutes}}"/> minutes ago

以下示例显示了翻译方式。

The following example displays the way to translate.

<trans-unit id="5a134dee893586d02bffc9611056b9cadf9abfad" datatype="html"> <source>{VAR_PLURAL, plural, =0 {just now} =1 {one minute ago} other {<x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{minutes}}"/> minutes ago} }</source> <target>{VAR_PLURAL, plural, =0 {à l'instant} =1 {il y a une minute} other {il y a <x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{minutes}}"/> minutes} }</target> </trans-unit>

翻译替代表达式link

Translate alternate expressionslink

Angular 还会提取备用的 select ICU 表达式作为单独的翻译单元。

Angular also extracts alternate select ICU expressions as separate translation units.

gender select 示例link

gender select examplelink

以下示例在组件模板中显示了一个 select ICU 表达式。

The following example displays a select ICU expression in the component template.

<span i18n>The author is {gender, select, male {male} female {female} other {other}}</span>

在这个例子中，Angular 将表达式提取到两个翻译单元中。第一个包含 select 子句之外的文本，并为 select 使用占位符（<x id="ICU">）：

In this example, Angular extracts the expression into two translation units. The first contains the text outside of the select clause, and uses a placeholder for select (<x id="ICU">):

<trans-unit id="f99f34ac9bd4606345071bd813858dec29f3b7d1" datatype="html"> <source>The author is <x id="ICU" equiv-text="{gender, select, male {...} female {...} other {...}}"/></source> <target>L'auteur est <x id="ICU" equiv-text="{gender, select, male {...} female {...} other {...}}"/></target> </trans-unit>

翻译文本时，如有必要，请移动占位符，但不要将其删除。如果删除占位符，将从翻译完的应用程序中删除此 ICU 表达式。

When you translate the text, move the placeholder if necessary, but don't remove it. If you remove the placeholder, the ICU expression is removed from your translated application.

以下示例显示包含 select 子句的第二个翻译单元。

The following example displays the second translation unit that contains the select clause.

<trans-unit id="eff74b75ab7364b6fa888f1cbfae901aaaf02295" datatype="html"> <source>{VAR_SELECT, select, male {male} female {female} other {other} }</source> <target>{VAR_SELECT, select, male {un homme} female {une femme} other {autre} }</target> </trans-unit>

以下示例显示了翻译完的两个翻译单元。

The following example displays both translation units after translation is complete.

<trans-unit id="f99f34ac9bd4606345071bd813858dec29f3b7d1" datatype="html"> <source>The author is <x id="ICU" equiv-text="{gender, select, male {...} female {...} other {...}}"/></source> <target>L'auteur est <x id="ICU" equiv-text="{gender, select, male {...} female {...} other {...}}"/></target> </trans-unit> <trans-unit id="eff74b75ab7364b6fa888f1cbfae901aaaf02295" datatype="html"> <source>{VAR_SELECT, select, male {male} female {female} other {other} }</source> <target>{VAR_SELECT, select, male {un homme} female {une femme} other {autre} }</target> </trans-unit>

翻译嵌套表达式link

Translate nested expressionslink

Angular 按照与替代表达式相同的方式处理嵌套表达式。Angular 会将表达式提取到两个翻译单元中。

Angular treats a nested expression in the same manner as an alternate expression. Angular extracts the expression into two translation units.

嵌套 plural 示例link

Nested plural examplelink

以下示例显示包含嵌套表达式之外的文本的第一个翻译单元。

The following example displays the first translation unit that contains the text outside of the nested expression.

<trans-unit id="972cb0cf3e442f7b1c00d7dab168ac08d6bdf20c" datatype="html"> <source>Updated: <x id="ICU" equiv-text="{minutes, plural, =0 {...} =1 {...} other {...}}"/></source> <target>Mis à jour: <x id="ICU" equiv-text="{minutes, plural, =0 {...} =1 {...} other {...}}"/></target> </trans-unit>

以下示例展示了包含完整嵌套表达式的第二个翻译单元。

The following example displays the second translation unit that contains the complete nested expression.

<trans-unit id="7151c2e67748b726f0864fc443861d45df21d706" datatype="html"> <source>{VAR_PLURAL, plural, =0 {just now} =1 {one minute ago} other {<x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{minutes}}"/> minutes ago by {VAR_SELECT, select, male {male} female {female} other {other} }} }</source> <target>{VAR_PLURAL, plural, =0 {à l'instant} =1 {il y a une minute} other {il y a <x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{minutes}}"/> minutes par {VAR_SELECT, select, male {un homme} female {une femme} other {autre} }} }</target> </trans-unit>

以下示例会在翻译后显示两个翻译单元。

The following example displays both translation units after translating.

<trans-unit id="972cb0cf3e442f7b1c00d7dab168ac08d6bdf20c" datatype="html"> <source>Updated: <x id="ICU" equiv-text="{minutes, plural, =0 {...} =1 {...} other {...}}"/></source> <target>Mis à jour: <x id="ICU" equiv-text="{minutes, plural, =0 {...} =1 {...} other {...}}"/></target> </trans-unit> <trans-unit id="7151c2e67748b726f0864fc443861d45df21d706" datatype="html"> <source>{VAR_PLURAL, plural, =0 {just now} =1 {one minute ago} other {<x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{minutes}}"/> minutes ago by {VAR_SELECT, select, male {male} female {female} other {other} }} }</source> <target>{VAR_PLURAL, plural, =0 {à l'instant} =1 {il y a une minute} other {il y a <x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{minutes}}"/> minutes par {VAR_SELECT, select, male {un homme} female {une femme} other {autre} }} }</target> </trans-unit>

下一步呢？link

What's nextlink

  • 将翻译结果合并到应用程序中

    Merge translations into the app

最后复查时间： 2/28/2022
